snippet: A lawyer for Pedro Espada Jr. said his contract provided him with an allowance for expenses, which he was free to use as he wished.
abstract: Maria Dolores Cruz, the first witness in the embezzlement trial of former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr, testifies that she saw Espada guide several schemes to steal money from the nonprofit Soundview Health Care Network; Cruz testifies that she attended meetings in which Espada brushed off questions that were raised about his exorbitant spending.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Pedro Espada Jr. said his contract provided him with an allowance for expenses, which he was free to use as he wished.

headline.seo: Spending By Pedro Espada Jr. Was Questioned, a Former Aide Says
headline.main: Aide Says Spending by Espada Raised Issue
headline.print_headline: Aide Says Spending By Espada Raised Issue
